title: [react-reconciler] schedulePassiveEffects is not a function when used with 16.8.1
body:
**Do you want to request a *feature* or report a *bug*?**

Bug

**What is the current behavior?**

```
schedulePassiveEffects is not a function
 TypeError: schedulePassiveEffects is not a function
    at commitRoot (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/node_modules/react-reconciler/cjs/react-reconciler.development.js:10543:35)
    at completeRoot (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/node_modules/react-reconciler/cjs/react-reconciler.development.js:11987:3)
    at performWorkOnRoot (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/node_modules/react-reconciler/cjs/react-reconciler.development.js:11916:9)
    at performWork (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/node_modules/react-reconciler/cjs/react-reconciler.development.js:11824:7)
    at performSyncWork (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/node_modules/react-reconciler/cjs/react-reconciler.development.js:11798:3)
    at requestWork (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/node_modules/react-reconciler/cjs/react-reconciler.development.js:11667:5)
    at scheduleWork (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/node_modules/react-reconciler/cjs/react-reconciler.development.js:11462:5)
    at scheduleRootUpdate (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/node_modules/react-reconciler/cjs/react-reconciler.development.js:12144:3)
    at updateContainerAtExpirationTime (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/node_modules/react-reconciler/cjs/react-reconciler.development.js:12172:10)
    at Object.updateContainer (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/node_modules/react-reconciler/cjs/react-reconciler.development.js:12229:10)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/src/renderer/render.js:14:12)
    at Generator.next (<anonymous>)
    at /Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/_/renderer/render.js:7:71
    at new Promise (<anonymous>)
    at __awaiter (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/_/renderer/render.js:3:12)
    at Object.render (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/packages/reactron/_/renderer/render.js:18:12)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/app/orbit-electron/src/main.tsx:65:7)
    at Generator.next (<anonymous>)
    at fulfilled (/Users/nw/projects/motion/orbit/app/orbit-electron/_/main.js:4:58)
    at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:68:7)
```

**If the current behavior is a bug, please provide the steps to reproduce and if possible a minimal demo of the problem. Your bug will get fixed much faster if we can run your code and it doesn't have dependencies other than React. Paste the link to your JSFiddle (https://jsfiddle.net/Luktwrdm/) or CodeSandbox (https://codesandbox.io/s/new) example below:**

I'm using react/react-dom 16.8.1 and react-reconciler 0.19.1. I have a custom renderer which then throw this error, which used to work with previous 16.7 and 16.8 alpha.

When I log out the $$hostConfig to see why schedulePassiveEffects isn't there, I see:

```
$$$hostConfig { now: [Function: now],
  supportsMutation: true,
  appendInitialChild: [Function: appendInitialChild],
  createInstance: [Function: createInstance],
  createTextInstance: [Function: createTextInstance],
  finalizeInitialChildren: [Function: finalizeInitialChildren],
  getPublicInstance: [Function: getPublicInstance],
  prepareUpdate: [Function: prepareUpdate],
  prepareForCommit: [Function: noop],
  resetAfterCommit: [Function: noop],
  resetTextContent: [Function: noop],
  getRootHostContext: [Function: getRootHostContext],
  getChildHostContext: [Function: getChildHostContext],
  shouldSetTextContent: [Function: shouldSetTextContent],
  appendChild: [Function: appendChild],
  appendChildToContainer: [Function: appendChildToContainer],
  removeChild: [Function: removeChild],
  removeChildFromContainer: [Function: removeChildFromContainer],
  commitUpdate: [Function: commitUpdate],
  commitTextUpdate: [Function: commitTextUpdate] }
```

I did a few sanity checks to be sure I didn't have a bad version, and cleaned node_modules re-installed.



---


I understand the config seems to have changed, and am updating it now. Just wanted to open this both for google-ability, and to sanity check in case I missed something.
